name: Steelskull

skills.name: Decay
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 10% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Cleansing Spell
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from a target ally, then heals them by 40%.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Protection
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 20% of their MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
